story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_0100:
Well, well... Professor Bellis. I should thank you
for joining us today.
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_0300:
You did quite a number to my lab, ransacking it
like you did.
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_0400: Did you even find what you were looking for?
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_0500:
No, unfortunately. But that’s why we’ve brought
you here.
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_0600: I don’t have anything that would do you any good.
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_0800:
You’ve been researching them, haven’t you? That’s
what I want—your data.
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_0900:
You know the secret to using sync stones to draw
out the power within Pokémon, don’t you?
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_1000: I’m sure you must have it written up somewhere.
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_1100: I don’t know what you’re talking about.
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_1200: Hmph. Fine. But just remember this...
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_1300:
We, too, are connected to our partner Pokémon.
It’s just a slightly more...nefarious connection.
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_1400:
If I can use sync stones to draw out even more
power from my Pokémon, I can have the strongest
army of underlings to do my bidding.
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_1500:
No way! I’m not researching sync stones for
evil criminals like you!
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_1600:
There is no such thing as good or evil when it
comes to power. There is only power...and those
who are willing to use it.
story_teamrocket_01_06000/2401_1201_1700:
You’ll come to see that soon enough. And I don’t
care if you like it or not.
